sentences.en: 60 percent of dogs and ten percent of cats have pedigrees.
A pedigree pup should have been inoculated against serious diseases before it's sold.
sentences.cn: 纯种狗应该在出售前注射预防严重疾病的针.

sentences.en: Examine its pedigree carefully before you buy such an expensive cat.
sentences.cn: 买这种昂贵的猫之前,要仔细检查它的纯种系谱.

sentences.en: Further refinements of pollen management include controlled crosses where the pedigree of the cross is required.
sentences.cn: 更细致的花粉管理工作,包括控制杂交,即必要杂交的系谱杂交.

sentences.en: He knew the name and pedigree of everybody in the Peerage, and everybody's relations.
sentences.cn: 他知道《缙绅录》上每个人的姓名和谱系以及他们所有的亲戚.

sentences.en: His pedigree was a little too perfect.
I have a violent pedigree. Unlike your family, pal!
sentences.cn: 我拥有暴力血缘. 不像你的家族, 老兄!

sentences.en: It is rather disappointing that so few of the features show clear - cut Mendelian pedigree patterns.
sentences.cn: 颇使人感到失望的是,只有很少的特征能显示出明显的孟德尔系谱类型.

sentences.en: Like any other commodity, pedigree dogs are covered by the Sale of Goods Act.
sentences.cn: 像其他商品一样，纯种狗的买卖同样受《货物买卖法》的约束。

sentences.en: Results Four affected members in the pedigree had classic phenotype of CFEOM.
sentences.cn: 结果家系中4名患者具有典型的CFEOM表现.

sentences.en: She had an impeccable aristocratic pedigree.
The champions really showed their pedigree today.
sentences.cn: 今天的冠军确实展现了其纯种系谱.

sentences.en: The famous drama Quyuan has a complicated edition pedigree.
sentences.cn: 摘要名剧《屈原》有较复杂的版本谱系.

sentences.en: The service pedigree helps to determine the importance of the service in context of all the services provided.
sentences.cn: 服务家谱可帮助确定服务在所提供的所有服务的上下文中的重要性。

sentences.en: The shepherd would like to hear the pedigree of your life, father.
sentences.cn: 爹,羊倌会高兴听听你的身世经历的.

sentences.en: These words have the same pedigree.
This chart, also known as a pedigree, lists members of each generation of your biological family, with all available health and disease information.
sentences.cn: 这份家谱关系图会列举出你这个家庭每一代所拥有成员，并附加有成员所有已知的健康和疾病信息。

sentences.en: Two appendixes are affixed : Wuxi Gu's pedigree and chronological table. "
sentences.cn: 正文后还有两个附录: 无锡泾皋顾氏世系表和 顾贞 观年表.

words.tran_cn: 建立纯种系谱而繁育（pedigree的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: a pedigree animal comes from a family that has been recorded for a long time and is considered to be of a very good  breed
the parents and other past family members of an animal or person, or an official written record of this
